thread.title: Allied Properties REIT Announces Conference Call to Discuss First-Quarter Financial Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Allied Properties REIT Announces Conference Call to Discuss First-Quarter Financial Results
text:
TORONTO, April 02, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Allied Properties REIT (TSX:AP.UN) will hold a conference call and live audio webcast at 10:00 a.m. (ET) on Thursday, May 3, 2018, to discuss financial results for the quarter ended March 31, 2018. The financial results will be released on Wednesday, May 2, 2018, after the markets close.
The conference call can be accessed by dialing 1(800) 239-9838 or (647) 794-4605. The webcast will be accessible at www.marketwired.com and www.alliedreit.com and will be archived for 90 days.
Allied is a leading owner, manager and developer of distinctive urban workspace in Canadaâ€™s major cities. Its objectives are to provide stable and growing cash distributions to unitholders and to maximize unitholder value through effective management and accretive portfolio growth.
FOR FURTHER INFORMATION, PLEASE CONTACT:
Michael R. Emory
President and Chief Executive Officer
(416) 977-9002
memory@alliedreit.com
Cecilia C. Williams
Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
(416) 977-9002
cwilliams@alliedreit.com
Source: Allied Properties REIT
